clinical_study.brief_title: Clinical Evaluation of the Xpert® HIV-1 VL
clinical_study.official_title: Clinical Evaluation of the Xpert® HIV-1 VL: A Method Comparison Study

brief_summary.textblock: Compare the clinical performance of the Xpert® HIV-1 VL to another FDA approved HIV-1 RNA quantitative assay using frozen and fresh specimens from known HIV-1 positive individuals.

primary_outcome.measure: Quantification of HIV-1 RNA in copies/mL in known HIV-1 positive subjects
primary_outcome.description: This study is a comparative analysis of HIV-1 RNA quantitation between Xpert HIV-1 VL to another FDA approved test. A single time point (cross-sectional) from each of at least 300 subjects with HIV-1 RNA quantitation within the dynamic range of both assays will be used in regression models to assess performance of the Xpert HIV-1 VL in comparison to the other FDA approved test.

arm_group.description: this is a study comparing Xpert HIV-1 VL assay quantitation to an already FDA approved HIV-1 quantitative HIV-1 RNA assay in known HIV-1 infected individuals

intervention.description: in vitro diagnostic test to quantify HIV-1 RNA

biospec_descr.textblock: Leftover plasma specimens will be retained in a biobank.

study_pop.textblock: Males and females >18 yours who are known HIV-1 infected and may be on treatment or untreated with ARV therapy

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- HIV-1 seropositive adults using an FDA approved method
- At least 18 years of age or older
- Informed consent, if applicable
Exclusion Criteria:
- Subject is less than 18 years of age
- Previously enrolled in this study
- Samples not collected according to the procedure
